item.title: Need help How Do i add drops for NPC?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

First of all you should go to Item2.cfg
than search for public static int goblinlow[] = {
Than copy the code and put it under the other one. Or copy this one

[code] public static int goblinlow[] = {

  861, 861, 861, 861, 861, 286, 286, 286, 444, 444, 1077, 1077, 1077, 1089, 1089, 1089,

  1125, 1125, 1125, 1165, 1165, 1165, 975, 975, 1005, 1005, 1005, 1005, 1005, 746};



public static int randomGoblinLow() {

    return goblinlow[(int) (Math.random() * goblinlow.length)];

}[/code]

Than delete all goblinlow pieces and change it with yours.
Now you should add the drops all the numbers in the code you should all replace them with your item IDâ€™s. The most left will come often the most right will come less.

Now we have to make the drops come you should open your NPChandler.java

Now search for: NOTE:(This is for the goblinlow, you could use the name of your monster) if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2688) {

If you are there you should copy a code and paste it in there.
Now change npcType == 2688 { into your monster ID.
And change Item2.randomGoblinLow into the name you used in the item2.cfg file.

now you are done and can happy play with drops

~Dark~
